This isn't eno's. Well holy shit, blatant tracing.

Welp, tbh NTR is getting a bit too formulaic these days. Introduce healthy relationships for 2 pages, introduce gyaru-oh, black dude, or ugly bastard, somehow the girl becomes a bitch before all that “alpha” energy, and before you know it, the girl is a slut and wants the guy’s dick all the time. It’s really just the art that’s carrying this genre now, and it’s a bit sickening. That being said, I came to the art and I will probably be back here again.

Oh and little tip. For the NTR to hurt less for beginners, skip the first 4 pages of any NTR doujin. All the “character development” is there, and you probably just came here for the fap.
For those of you wondering, yes this is traced using eno's work
